name: Caveman
overview: Enter the prehistoric world and discover its difficulties that our ancestors had to find their food. The idea of the game is to choose one's way in the middle of infested plains monsters, and through traitorous mountain ranges, for reach the pterodactyl cave. Once reached, you must fly precious eggs of this monster and return to the cave by the way by the mountains and the plains trying not to make you eat by a beast hungry on the way. You can only wear an egg at a time, so six brave expeditions will be needed for all the eggs have been stolen successfully.
